This game is the Lil Dicky of video games. You play it for the first time and everyone is like "this game is pretty cool I love it" and you play it non stop for days on end but then after a while you think the game gets boring doing the same thing over and over without ranking up but then there is a new update and they add a new map or new gun like when Lil Dicky releases a new song and its good again but just like when Lil Dicky doesnt have new songs, then it isnt relevant anymore. That is this game.
